page.title: 15Housing Conditions
page.content: Ownership varies from private housing of recent development to NCB owned 'Pit Rows' and council controlled estates.Residents were interviewed and gave their opinion concerning conditions: (Milfield Court comprises three-bedroomed terrace housing. Gardens were small and the children had little play area because the court fronted onto Bedlington Main Street. Barrington Court: also provides easy access to the shops but the houses are larger. The Chesters: is a new estate of semi-detached houses. The estate was considered friendly but there was little for the children to do. Pit Rows are traditionally friendly places. Hollymount Square: was a council estate and very quiet. The residents were delighted with recent modernization schemes.
